Title: Information Exposure
Description: The tab switching cookie is not properly escaped.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.4.0 before 2.4.5, all versions starting from 3.0.0 before 3.1.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.4.0, all versions starting from 2.4.5 before 3.0.0, all versions starting from 3.1.1
